name: Conwy - Gitlab
description: Dark, low-contrast, brightness inversion theme for gitlab.
additional_info:
• 2019-12-18: 1.4.2: do not invert emojis
  • 1.4.1: make job logs dark
  • 1.4.0: more contrast in edit button in diff view
  • 1.3.0: invert empty merge request list image, thinner scroll bars
  • 1.2.0: make diff highlighting more visible
  • 1.1.0: make build traces dark
